DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Efficacy Safety DWJ1252 treatment Functional Dyspepsia .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety DWJ1252 Treatment Functional Dyspepsia
DOC.criteria: Male female least 19 year old Patient functional dyspepsia meet ROME III criterion Patients previous gastrointestinal surgery Patients history gastrointestinal bleeding , mechanical obstruction , perforation Patients history gastrointestinal cancer
